navigator.description: A web-ui for managing your ContainerShip cluster

service-discovery.description: A service discovery plugin for ContainerShip

cloud.description: Official ContainerShip plugin for managing clusters with ContainerShip Cloud

cloud-hints.description: A ContainerShip plugin used to automatically set cloud metadata in the form of host tags

standalone.description: Official ContainerShip plugin for launching a local ContainerShip cluster

tide.description: A cron-like job scheduler for ContainerShip
